item.title: “Every millisecond matters:” Why a Formula E team picked Cato Networks to connect its pitlane
item.description: To meet security and networking demands, the TAG Heuer Porsche Formula E Team has partnered with Cato Networks since 2023.

item.title: Alibaba releases Qwen with Questions, an open reasoning model that beats o1-preview
item.description: QwQ uses inference-time scaling to solve complex reasoning and planning questions, besting OpenAI's o1 in several benchmarks.

item.title: Alibaba researchers unveil Marco-o1, an LLM with advanced reasoning capabilities
item.description: The model uses more cycles during inference to generate more tokens and review responses, improving its performance on reasoning tasks.
